name: re:Slime
description:
A humble slime has somehow acquired consumed a faulty Save Crystal.
On the upside, dodgy immortality for the win!
Downside: faulty Save Crystal..

A fresh start to experience all your old mistakes again in brand new ways..

Die to Progress
Progress to wash away old sins with new
